title: Alyce Rogers
text: Alyce Rogers is an American <a href="mezzo-soprano">mezzo-soprano</a> and <a href="alto">alto</a> <a href="opera">opera</a> singer. She began her career as an actor on the East Coast, but later found her passion in opera and light opera. After moving to <a href="Portland%2C%20Oregon">Portland</a>, Oregon, she appeared with the <a href="Oregon%20Symphony">Oregon Symphony</a>, the <a href="Israel%20Philharmonic%20Orchestra">Israel Philharmonic Orchestra</a>, and the <a href="Seattle%20Symphony%20Orchestra">Seattle Symphony Orchestra</a>, among others. Rogers is well known for her interpretations of the <a href="Mezzo-soprano">mezzo</a> and <a href="contralto">contralto</a> riles in the operas of <a href="Gilbert%20and%20Sullivan">Gilbert and Sullivan</a>, and Menotti.
